author: Tal Axelrod
title: Eleven interesting races to watch in 2022
Left and Center-Left Both Claim Stacey Abrams. Who's Right?

sentence: Because Democrats have made masking a test of one's good character, Abrams opened herself up to allegations of hypocrisy and unseriousness, allegations that were quickly and rightly supplied by Republican critics such as Governor Brian Kemp and former senator David Perdue.
author: NR Editors
title: The Week

sentence: Democrat Stacey Abrams is telling Georgia voters that I did the work and now I want the job,? arguing that the last four years since she narrowly lost the 2018 governor's race to Brian Kemp have left her better prepared to govern as she runs again in 2022.
title: Stacey Abrams says she's more ready to be Georgia governor

sentence: Running again against Brian Kemp, Abrams trails 48.5 points to 44 points in the RealClearPolitics poll average.
author: Dan McLaughlin
title: The Candidates Who Can't Afford to Lose in 2022
